title: Completed PE Summary - Corner Brook
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Gorthon International Shipping Ltd
Port of registry: Hamilton
Flag: Bermuda
Type: Cargo Vessel
Built: 1976
Classification society: Norske Veritas
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 135.8
Gross tonnage: 5735
Date & Time 20/03/05 10:45
Location of incident: Foreign high seas
Incident Type: Fire/Explosion
Persons onboard: 18
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Material Damage/No Pollution

Synopsis

As a result of the failure of a main engine fuel pump inlet pipe fitting, this palletised cargo vessel suffered a major engine room fire about 700 miles west of the UK. A Mayday was broadcast over the VHF and via satellite phone to Stavanger MRCC. The fire was extinguished by ships staff, using a combination of CO2 flooding and traditional fire fighting techniques. The vessel was towed to Tilbury, arriving 30/03/05.

Action taken:

The MAIB presented their findings to the Bermudan Maritime Administration who made recommendations to the company regarding supervision of maintenance and the use of DSC in emergencies.
